abstract: Federal authorities arrested Tyrone L. Gilliams Jr., a commodities trader, on Wednesday morning in Philadelphia. He is expected to make an appearance at Federal District Court in Manhattan on Wednesday afternoon.
snippet: Federal authorities arrested Tyrone L. Gilliams Jr., a commodities trader, on Wednesday morning in Philadelphia. He is expected to make an appearance at Federal District Court in Manhattan on Wednesday afternoon.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities arrested Tyrone L. Gilliams Jr., a commodities trader, on Wednesday morning in Philadelphia. He is expected to make an appearance at Federal District Court in Manhattan on Wednesday afternoon. Haven't heard of Mr. Gilliams? Then you didn't read this Reuters Special Report in May, which detailed a civil lawsuit that accused Mr. Gilliams, a former standout on the University of Pennsylvania basketball squad, of defrauding an investor of $4 million. Here is the sealed complaint. Read more »

headline.main: Rap, Trading and Now a Rap Sheet
